This is the game version that was sold before the September, 11th, 2001 attack to World Trade Center. After the attack, Activision withdrew all the copies of this game from the stores and make a new version of the game. The censored version has some changes from the original version. For example, Activision remade the last level called "Top of the World" and censoring the game content. The uncensored version of the game is almost impossible to find. This version of the game is rare and, therefore, a relic.

Esta es la versiÃƒÂ³n del juego que fue vendida antes del ataque al World Trade Center el 11 de Septiembre del 2001. DespuÃƒÂ©s del ataque, Activision retirÃƒÂ³ todas las copias del juego de las tiendas y lanzÃƒÂ³ una nueva versiÃƒÂ³n del juego. La versiÃƒÂ³n censurada tiene algunos cambios que la versiÃƒÂ³n original. Por ejemplo, Activision recreÃƒÂ³ el ÃƒÂºltimo nivel llamado "La Cima del Mundo" y censurÃƒÂ³ el contenido del juego. La versiÃƒÂ³n sin censura del juego es casi imposible de encontrar. esta versiÃƒÂ³n del juego es muy rara de encontrar, y por lo tanto, es una reliquia.

I have to made some explanation of this game.
Tengo que hacer algunas aclaraciones acerca de este juego.

GAME REGION
REGIÃƒâ€œN DEL JUEGO

The uncensored version of the game is typically found as a PAL game, sold in Europe. I'm not sure that this game has a NTSC version.

Since the uncensored version of the game is originally a PAL game, it can not be played in old TV's with NTSC norm. In order to allow compatibility between PAL games and NTSC TV Sets, the PAL games were "patched" in order to be displayed in NTSC TV Sets. However, the PAL to NTSC patching process alters the game. One of the consequences of patching PAL->NTSC is the minimal amount of Image Lost.

Since NTSC has a resolution of 720x480 and PAL games are made to be displayed on 720x576 TV Sets, the patch tries to center the image in order to "fit" 720x576 pixels inside 720x480 pixels of a NTSC TV Set. That's why you get Image lost. You can not shrink the image. You can only center it an cut it.

Another issue of patching PAL->NTSC is the sound. The NTSC system works with 60hz of image frecuency. PAL systems work with 50hz. Thefore, there will be some sound lags of PAL games played in NTSC systems.

This game was patched from PAL to NTSC, so you may be experience some sound issues, and of course, the image lost. However, this will not affect the gameplay of the game. I can not do anything about it. This game is patched and that's all. I can not remove the patch. Of course, you can try to manipulate the game, but that's out of my responsability.

Dado que la versiÃƒÂ³n sin cesnura del juego es originalmente un juego PAL, no se puede jugar en viejos televisores que funcionen con la norma NTSC. Dado que NTSC tiene una resoluciÃƒÂ³n de 720x480 y los juegos PAL estÃƒÂ¡n hechos para ser mostrados en televisores con 720x576 de resoluciÃƒÂ³n, el parche intenta centrar la imagen del juego PAL para que esos 720x576 pixeles "alcancen" dentro de los 720x480 pixeles de un televisor NTSC. Por eso hay una PÃƒÂ©rdida de Imagen. No se puede encoger la imagen. SÃƒÂ³lo se puede centrarla y recortarla.

Otro de los problemas del parcheo PAL->NTSC es el sonido. El sistema NTSC funciona a 60hz de frecuencia de imagen. Los sistemas PAL funcionan con 50hz. Por lo tanto, habrÃƒÂ¡ un desfase de audio de parte de los juegos PAL que se juegan en un TV NTSC.

Este juego fue parchado de PAL a NTSC, asÃƒÂ­ que podrÃƒÂ­as experimentar algunos problemas con el sonido, y por supuesto, la pÃƒÂ©rdida de imagen. Sin embargo, esto no afectarÃƒÂ¡ la jugabilidad. GAME PROTECTION
PROTECCIÃƒâ€œN DEL JUEGO

Although I have created this game image from my black PlayStation disk, this is not an original image of the game. As I said before, this game is patched and someone had to do it. It seems that someone called "Loser2000" released this game image. When you start the game, you will not see the original Sony Computer Entertainment America/Europe logotype. You will see a black image saying: "Presented By Loser2000. Obviously, I'm not Loser2000. I'm just stating that this is not an original game image released by Sony Computer Entertainment. Therefore, I think this game image is not protected somehow.
